title: Kal la i hun zawngin thawk la
lyrics:
Kal la, i hun zawngin thawk la,
I lawm nan Pa duhzawng ti la;
Chu chu Lalpa kalkawng a ni,
Ringtu, i zawh dawn lo vem ni?

Kal la, thawk rawh, a la tawk lo,
Hlohna hi van hlepna a ni;
Mihringin an fak lo che a,
Lalpan a fak loh che ring suh.

Kal la, thawk rawh, thawh hun a ni,
I thinlung chhung tilawm turin;
A hmangaihin a fak a che,
I thawhrimna a thlawn lo vang.

Kal la, a hun laiin thawk rawh,
Khawvel thimna a lo chhah zual;
Dawngdahna paihin thawk nghal rawh,
thlarau chhandamna a ni ang.

I kiangah thimah mi an thi,
Thlanah thlamuanna nei lovin;
Meichher lain chhi eng zau rawh,
Thhim chhan ber pawh a kiantir ang.

Thawk zel la, chau lovin veng rawh,
Fing la, thlarau bo hruai turin;
Khawvel hmun zauvah kal chhuak la,
Vak bote chu hruai lut hram rawh.

Thawk zel la, i thawhah lawm rawh,
Thawhrim chu chawlhna nuam a ni;
Moneitu aw i hre thuai ang,
Aw chu ngai rawh, "Ka lo kal e."
